Please allow use of your camera to use this feature
Developed By: 4Dudes LLC (Caleb Dudley, Jay Harrison, Adam Kinard, Grant Marsh)
QshaRe: An app that can do some things, but not all things. Use it wisely...

To upload a new file, select the Floating Action Button at the bottom right-hand side of the screen. From the options that appear, tap the \"Upload\" button and the Android File Selector will appear to let you choose your file. For best results, try to upload smaller documents as Google Drive has a size limit that could cause errors.

To scan a QR code, select the Floating Action Button at the bottom right-hand side of the screen. From the options that appear, tap the \"Scan Code\" button and the Scanning Page will appear. Simply point your camera at a valid QR code and QshaRe will automatically add the file to your list of available documents.

To access a file and it\'s associated QR code, select any uploaded or previously scanned file from the Home Page. This will bring up the detail view of your file including a sharable QR code and link.\n\nTo share the Google Drive link with someone else, you can click \"Share\" to choose which app you would like to use.

To delete an individual file, swipe right on the file on the Home Page. To delete all of your files, go to the Settings Page and select the option \"Delete All Files\". Be aware, this will delete ALL of your files irreversibly from the app. They will NOT be deleted from Google Drive however, only from your app\'s memory.
